#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>
#include <vector>
#include <map>
using namespace std;
#define maxn 10010
#define mod 1000000007
typedef long long LL;
map<int,int>mp;
map<int,int>::iterator it;
LL x[10];
char s[maxn];
LL C(LL x,LL y){
    if(y==1) return x;
    if(y==2) return (x*(x-1)/2)%mod;
    if(y==3) return (x*(x-1)*(x-2)/6)%mod;
    if(y==4) return ((x*(x-1)/2*(x-2)*(x-3)/3)/4)%mod;
}
int digit(int n){
    if(n>=0 && n<10) return n;
    int ans=0;
    while(n){
        ans+=n%10;
        n/=10;
    }
    return ans;
}
int main(){
    int T;
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--){
        scanf("%s",&s);
        int l=strlen(s);
        memset(x,0,sizeof(x));
        for(int i=0;i<l;i++){
            x[s[i]-'0']++;
        }
        LL ans=0;
        for(int i=0;i<=10;i++){
            for(int j=i;j<=10;j++){
                for(int k=j;k<=10;k++){
                    for(int o=k;o<=10;o++){
                        mp.clear();
                        mp[i]++;
                        mp[j]++;
                        mp[k]++;
                        mp[o]++;
                        int sum=0;
                        if(i<10) sum+=i;
                        if(j<10) sum+=j;
                        if(k<10) sum+=k;
                        if(o<10) sum+=o;
                        if(digit(sum)!=9) continue;
                        LL tmp=1;
                        for(it=mp.begin();it!=mp.end();it++){
                            if(it->first==10) ;
                            else{
                                tmp=tmp*C(x[it->first],it->second);
                                tmp%=mod;
                            }
                        }
                        ans+=tmp;
                        ans%=mod;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        printf("%I64d\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
